uuid-generator.title: UUIDs generator
uuid-generator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems. The number of possible UUIDs is 16^32, which is 2^128 or about 3.4x10^38 (which is a lot!).
uuid-generator.uuidVersionDescription: Select the UUID version to generate.
uuid-generator.versionV1Description: Time-based UUID using timestamp and MAC address.
uuid-generator.versionV3Description: Name-based UUID using MD5 hashing and namespace.
uuid-generator.versionV5Description: Name-based UUID using SHA-1 hashing and namespace.
uuid-generator.namespaceDescription: Select a predefined namespace or enter a custom UUID.
uuid-generator.name: Name
